com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api

Interface ILauncher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuroraLauncher, LocalLauncher, MesosLauncher, Nullity.NullLauncher

    public interface ILauncher
    Launches scheduler. heron-cli will create Launcher object using default no argument constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(LaunchContext context)
      Initialize Launcher with Config, Uploader and topology.
      boolean launchTopology(PackingPlan packing)
      Starts scheduler.
      boolean postLaunch(PackingPlan packing)
      Will be called locally after launching topology remotely
      boolean prepareLaunch(PackingPlan packing)
      Will be called locally before trying to launch topology remotely
      void undo()
      In case launch fails, this is called to clean up states.
      ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState updateExecutionState(ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState executionState)
      Add/Modify additional information in execution state.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(LaunchContext context)
        Initialize Launcher with Config, Uploader and topology. These object will be passed from submitter main. Config will contain information that launcher may use to setup scheduler and other parameters required by launcher to contact services which will launch scheduler.

      • prepareLaunch

        boolean prepareLaunch(PackingPlan packing)
        Will be called locally before trying to launch topology remotely
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • launchTopology

        boolean launchTopology(PackingPlan packing)
        Starts scheduler. Once this function returns successfully, heron-cli will terminate and launch process succeed.
        Parameters:
        packing - Initial mapping suggested by running packing algorithm. container_id->List of instance_id to be launched on this container.
        Returns:
        true if topology launched successfully, false otherwise.

      • postLaunch

        boolean postLaunch(PackingPlan packing)
        Will be called locally after launching topology remotely
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • undo

        void undo()
        In case launch fails, this is called to clean up states.

      • updateExecutionState

        ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState updateExecutionState(ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState executionState)
        Add/Modify additional information in execution state. Returns new ExecutionState created using current execution state and adding additional Launch specific information TODO(nbhagat): Don't overload heron's ExecutionState with scheduler specific data.
        Parameters:
        executionState - Default execution state with all required fields set.
        Returns:
        Updated execution state.
